body.name: Shark HZ251 Ultralight Corded Stick Self-Cleaning Brushroll, Perfect, Converts to Hand Vacuum, LED Headlights, - Pet Crevice & Upholstery Tools, Teal.32 Quarts Capacity
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
features: DEEP CARPET CLEANING: Thorough deep carpet cleaning and powerful pet hair pickup on all surfaces.
NO HAIR WRAP: Pick up more hair with no hair wrap (vs. Shark bristle brushrolls).
ULTRA-LIGHTWEIGHT: Powerful suction in a hand vacuum that weighs less than 3 lbs.
SELF-CLEANING BRUSHROLL: Self-cleaning brushroll for powerful pet hair pickup with no hair wrap.
REMOVABLE DUST CUP: Removable, easy-to-empty dust cup.
LED HEADLIGHTS: LED headlights on the nozzle reveal hidden debris and pet hair around your home.
LOW-PROFILE DESIGN: Allows you to easily reach under furniture.
ADVANCED SWIVEL STEERING: For excellent maneuverability around furniture.
PRECISION HANDHELD VACUUM: Tapered design for cleaning tight spaces.
WHAT'S INCLUDED: HZ602 Corded Stick Vacuum, Crevice Tool, Upholstery Tool, Pet Power Brush, and Onboard Storage Clip.
body.description: Shark has completely reinvented the stick vacuum, delivering a sub-3-pound handheld vacuum packed with deep-cleaning power. The Shark UltraLight Stick Vacuum with Self-Cleaning Brushroll is perfect for homes with pets, giving you above-floor versatility to pick up pet hair on couches, tight spaces, and more, while delivering powerful suction on floors, along with the self-cleaning brushroll to eliminate hair wrap as you clean. The Shark UltraLight Stick Vacuum is so versatile, you can clean on and above the floor–even under furniture–and when you’re done, emptying is a breeze with an easy-to-use removable dust cup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really cleans the dust and fur from the floor!
reviews.reviewText: Easy to set up and vacuum. The suction power is strong and really collects the dog hair that you don’t see with the naked eye. Dirt cup easy to remove and dump. Really like the air freshener included in the floor attachment. Light weight to handle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This vacuum is awesome and good looking too. It has a nice blue light effect all around the hand held part and lights on the front of the power head attachment so that you can see the dirt you are vacuuming The cord is super long so you can cover a lot of distance without having to unplug and move the cord. When you remove the extended bar in the middle, it becomes a hand-held vacuum and is very light if you use one of the attachments. The weight in this vacuum is the power head. It can slip into a closet easily and the best part is that all of the filters actually wash out easily in the sink. It is so quick to empty the dirt cup also. Dog hair cleaning is a cinch with this machine, I love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This thing SUCKS!
reviews.reviewText: Got this to replace a 15 year old Shark vacuum. The old one seemed to have asthma and was tired. Well, we're all getting old and tired aren't we? This one is WOW. I am very happy with it, so much so that I am willing to forgive it for not being able to stand up unsupported. I was wary of it having the air freshener cartridge, but found it to not be annoying at all, and it doesn't make me sneeze! That's a plus. The suction on this is amazing. Having three cats and one of them being a Maine Coon who is currently in shedding season, I'm finding this vacuum super easy to just pull out of the closet 2 or 3 times a day to adios a trail of Rocky fur balls. The vacuum does have a learning curve to it, though. It is top-heavy, having the motor on top, rather than have it situated on bottom with the stick and handle on top. It's off balance and takes a bit of getting used to. The maneuverability of this vacuum is amazing, and at first I thought it was the straight back and forth like I was used to until I twisted it and it turned. I was all, "Wait, what?" This is a really easy vacuum to use. Now I need to find some specialty attachments for it....

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this vacuum!
reviews.reviewText: My friend convinced me to spend a little more on a quality stick vacuum and insisted that it would make vacuuming a less onerous chore. She was right! I have three dogs and a cat. The cord is nice and long so I’m not moving it all the time, light weight and very maneuverable, sucks up hair like a boss. I can easily move from the carpeted to hardwood and tile areas of my house. I’m so glad I made this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Effective but has some cons
reviews.reviewText: Pros: strong power/suction even in a pet friendly home, easy to empty, various attachments, corded so no worries of the battery wearing out. The flat fuzzy brush is really good on blinds. The pivot features on the bottom floor part are really easy to use.Cons: The two big things I don't like about this vacuum are that it doesn't stand up independently and it's hard to prop it up when not in use, even if just for a minute. It constantly falls down and is awkwardly weighted. The exhaust vents are also awkwardly placed so I often find myself getting blown in the face with hot vacuum air when I'm trying to move things out of the way or clean at any kind of angle, which really grosses me out because I feel like that air just had contact with the dirt I'm vacuuming up. It's also kind of heavy, and the functions aren't always intuitive or well marked when you want to remove the floor part to switch to handheld. I also wish there was a way to shorten the tube for handheld use, which is what I expected when I bought it. It's a nice vacuum but I wouldn't buy it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good Vacuum - a Bit Over Priced
reviews.reviewText: It has been a good vacuum...but, with the small capacity I think it's a bit over priced. I feel this vaccuum shouldn't be over $100. Pros: Good leverage with swivel head for reaching places. Lightweight and easy to use. Sufficient suction power-but nothing amazing. Cons: Small capacity dirt trap/container. You can't stop vacuuming and pick something up/move furniture without it toppling over (top heavy when vacuum is attached)-you'd have to shut off and hang the detachable vacuum on the peg it is meant to hang on for storage...you also can't store any other way or it will fall over.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Must have vacuum
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to replace a dirt devil stick and it is 1000x better. Great suction and very maneuverable to go under furniture and around corners. It unhooks for a hand held and has a few attachments.Only down sides, it blows very hot when you are using it, and it doesn’t stand up independently. Neither are deal breakers and it is well worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars All in one
reviews.reviewText: This vacuum works amazing! The fact that I don’t need to bend down to take bottom off to get the stick for small places makes it work best. Also the container is removable unlike other vacuums where I had to bri g the whole vacuum next to trash can to remove the container.It picks up allllllll my dogs hair and more.
Me encanto, funciona perfecto, recoge pelo de perros muy bien. Totalmente recomendable.
